name: Purgatory (itch) (Sonicboomcolt)
description:
You and your friends have been sent to purgatory, unfortunately your friends weren't so lucky. They had the souls ripped from their ghostly body, lost forever. You must save them to escape purgatory.

A & D = Move
W = Jump
R = Reload Level
ESC = Back To Menu

Created in 48 hour time limit for the Spooky 2D Game Jam.
All assets created during the jam, some sounds made by me, also other  sounds were pre-existing under the CC0 Copyright.

Music created by Sonicboomcolt (Me): [Soundcloud Link]
